properties.description: Cafe zone with free refreshments and crafts.
properties.title: Buckskin Evangelical Church

properties.address: Mortimer Methodist Church, 17, West End Road, Mortimer, Reading, West Berkshire RG7 3TB
properties.description: Warm Welcome. None denominational everyone welcome. Tea, coffee, biscuits and home made cake. Daily, weekly Newspapers to read. Jigsaw puzzle on the go. Adult colouring books, quiz books, Sudoku and different board games all available. Some bring knitting, sewing, crochet etc. Quiet space in the Church sanctuary if needed. We have a large book with numbers of different agencies etc to signpost anyone who needs help with anything. We do chair exercises once a month for 30 mins to 1hour. Or just sit and chat to each other making new friends.
properties.title: Mortimer Methodist Church

properties.address: Church Of The Good Shepherd, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG23 8BU
properties.description: Open from Already open. We cater for anyone and everyone We provide refreshments including homemade cakes. We provide activities such as jigsaws and crafts for adults and children. In school holidays we provide more activities for children.
properties.title: Oasis

properties.address: Proteus Creation Space, Basingstoke, England RG21 3DH
properties.description: Located by Fairfields Primary School, our cafe welcomes families and those who need space to work. no purchase is necessary. We have books for adults and children and also board games and toys.
properties.title: Proteus Creation Space

properties.address: Rathbone Pavilion, Cuckoo Meadow, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG25 2BL
properties.description: The activities are held in the Doris Cook room, with space for ~ 20 people. Facilities provided include tables and chairs, various games and activities, tea and coffee.
properties.title: Rathbone Pavilion

properties.address: Rucstall Community Association,, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG21 3EX
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 27th November 2023** Once Winter starts we will open the doors for a couple days a week. We try to cater for everyone - activities available, all kinds of things to do so hopefully suits all our users. Soft play areas for our younger guests - Games consoles for the older kids (age appropriate games) , shared book library plus pool table.
properties.title: Rucstall Community Centre

properties.address: Sherborne St. Johns Village Hall, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG24 9HP

properties.title: St Marys Church Basingstoke

properties.address: St. Mark's Church, Homesteads Road, Basingstoke, Hampshire RG22 5LQ
properties.description: Our Warm Space is within the church worship area which, at other times, is used for community activities such as Mums and Toddlers, slimming club, youth club. Our Warm Welcome space is free to enter and enjoy free hot drinks / snacks. From 2pm - 4p.m. we also share the space with Tea@2, where there is an optional or 'pay as you like' basis for food and drink. Free hot drinks and snacks will remain available.
properties.title: St. Mark's Church

properties.description: Community cafe in the church open to all. Warm space, fresh coffee, tea & biscuits and, very often, homemade cake. All complimentary. Place to bring a friend for a coffee or come on your own and meet others. Always a lively discussion on our 'shared' table.
properties.title: Welcome Cafe
